variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: RCPA1
variable.description: Q1. How often do you attend church? [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]

variable.name: RCPA2
variable.description: Q2. How often do you pray privately? [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]

variable.name: RCPA3C

variable.name: RCPA3D

variable.name: RCPA3E
variable.description: Q3e. How often do you have the following experiences? I feel God's love for me [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]

variable.name: RCPA3F

variable.name: RCPA4
variable.description: Q4. Religion involved in dealing with stress [Visit 1] [Approach to Life C, RCP]
